title: Continuing Education  |  Academics  |  DePaul University | DePaul University, Chicago
content: Continuing Education ​Since 1972, DePaul has demonstrated its commitment to working professionals with innovative programs to support lifelong learning for adults. Whether you are completing your degree or looking to advance your career, DePaul has a program that fits, spanning a wide range of undergraduate degree, graduate degree and continuing education offerings. This is a sample of allundergraduateandgraduateprograms offered at DePaul. Select InterestsAllBusinessCommunicationCommunity DevelopmentEducationFinanceHealthcareHuman ResourcesLawManagement & LeadershipMarketing & Public RelationsProject ManagementPublic ServiceScienceSocial ScienceTechnology Select EducationTypeAllBachelor'sMaster'sDoctoralCertificateSeminarWorkshopCourseCredential Select LocationAllOn-campusOnline Accountancy(Bachelor's)Close×The BS in Accountancy provides students a foundation of knowledge in management, finance, marketing, business law and technology, while preparing to sit for the CPA exam.Program Page Accountancy The BS in Accountancy provides students a foundation of knowledge in management, finance, marketing, business law and technology, while preparing to sit for the CPA exam. Accountancy(Master's)Close×The MS in Accountancy student gains a solid understanding of a variety of business disciplines to be a proficient, industry-ready accountant.Program Page Accountancy The MS in Accountancy student gains a solid understanding of a variety of business disciplines to be a proficient, industry-ready accountant. Analytics(Certificate)Close×The Analytics certificate is to develop and improve technical and quantitative skills for the analysis of large datasets and gain experience using data-mining software.Program Page Analytics The Analytics certificate is to develop and improve technical and quantitative skills for the analysis of large datasets and gain experience using data-mining software. Applied Behavioral Sciences for Adult Students(Bachelor's)Close×The BA in Applied Behavioral Science for Adult Students is designed for students with an Associate's degree seeking a career in human services and other related fields.Program Page Applied Behavioral Sciences for Adult Students The BA in Applied Behavioral Science for Adult Students is designed for students with an Associate's degree seeking a career in human services and other related fields. Applied Mathematics(Master's)Close×The MS in Applied Mathematics provides students the expertise to use various tools and methods to support quantitative analysis used for strategic decision-making.Program Page Applied Mathematics The MS in Applied Mathematics provides students the expertise to use various tools and methods to support quantitative analysis used for strategic decision-making. Applied Professional Studies for Adult Students(Master's)Close×The MA in Applied Professional Studies for Adult Students allows students to design and study personally-relevant topics not served by existing graduate programs.Program Page Applied Professional Studies for Adult Students The MA in Applied Professional Studies for Adult Students allows students to design and study personally-relevant topics not served by existing graduate programs. Applied Statistics(Certificate)Close×The certificate in Applied Statistics program requires successful completion of six courses in Applied Statistics.Program Page Applied Statistics The certificate in Applied Statistics program requires successful completion of six courses in Applied Statistics. Applied Statistics(Master's)Close×The MS in Applied Statistics focuses on the ability to research, analyze, interpret data and also explores how to tackle problems of statistical design, analysis and control.Program Page Applied Statistics The MS in Applied Statistics focuses on the ability to research, analyze, interpret data and also explores how to tackle problems of statistical design, analysis and control. Audit and Advisory Services(Master's)Close×The MS in Audit and Advisory Service provides students practical, advanced auditing skills to excel in a public accounting firm or corporate internal audit department.Program Page Audit and Advisory Services The MS in Audit and Advisory Service provides students practical, advanced auditing skills to excel in a public accounting firm or corporate internal audit department. Biological Sciences(Bachelor's)Close×BS in Biological Sciences students take a year of introductory biology, a genetics course, a biostatistics course and offers students seven different concentrations.Program Page Biological Sciences BS in Biological Sciences students take a year of introductory biology, a genetics course, a biostatistics course and offers students seven different concentrations. Building an Effective Marketing Plan(Certificate)Close×The Building an Effective Marketing Plan certificate program provides a review of the elements of marketing and examines how each element fits into the overall business plan.Program Page Building an Effective Marketing Plan The Building an Effective Marketing Plan certificate program provides a review of the elements of marketing and examines how each element fits into the overall business plan. Business Administration(Doctoral)Close×The Doctorate in Business Administration (DBA) prepares graduates with the skills and knowledge to accelerate career advancement in higher education or the corporate world.Program Page Business Administration The Doctorate in Business Administration (DBA) prepares graduates with the skills and knowledge to accelerate career advancement in higher education or the corporate world. Business Administration(Master's)Close×The MBA program provides a transformational learning experience that develops the leadership skills you need to face the business challenges of tomorrow.Program Page Business Administration The MBA program provides a transformational learning experience that develops the leadership skills you need to face the business challenges of tomorrow. Business Administration(Bachelor's)Close×The BS in Business Administration offers a variety of courses, giving you the opportunity to learn about fields such as entrepreneurship, management, economics and marketing.Program Page Business Administration The BS in Business Administration offers a variety of courses, giving you the opportunity to learn about fields such as entrepreneurship, management, economics and marketing. Business Administration for Adult Students(Bachelor's)Close×The BA in Business Administration for Adult Students delivers knowledge and skills for corporate and nonprofit settings with a focus on managerial and supervisory positions.Program Page Business Administration for Adult Students The BA in Business Administration for Adult Students delivers knowledge and skills for corporate and nonprofit settings with a focus on managerial and supervisory positions. Business Analyst(Certificate)Close×The Business Analyst certificate studies policies, operations, and structure of an organization and prepares students for the Certified Business Analysis Professional exam.Program Page Business Analyst The Business Analyst certificate studies policies, operations, and structure of an organization and prepares students for the Certified Business Analysis Professional exam. Business Information Technology(Master's)Close×The MS in Business Information Technology provides students the core principles of business and technology in corporations, health care institutions and government agencies.Program Page Business Information Technology The MS in Business Information Technology provides students the core principles of business and technology in corporations, health care institutions and government agencies. Business Writing and Grammar Essentials(Seminar)Close×The Business Writing and Grammar Essentials seminar features exercises to sharpen your grammar, punctuation, and word choices, so your writing will be more professional.Program Page Business Writing and Grammar Essentials The Business Writing and Grammar Essentials seminar features exercises to sharpen your grammar, punctuation, and word choices, so your writing will be more professional. Clinical Psychology(Doctoral)Close×The MA/PhD in Clinical Psychology is a combined degree for students intending to earn the PhD. The program emphasizes training in both scientific research and practice.Program Page Clinical Psychology The MA/PhD in Clinical Psychology is a combined degree for students intending to earn the PhD. The program emphasizes training in both scientific research and practice. Communication and Media(Bachelor's)Close×The BA in Communication and Media provides students the fundamental communication and critical thinking skills needed to enter jobs in the public, private and non-profit sectors.Program Page Communication and Media The BA in Communication and Media provides students the fundamental communication and critical thinking skills needed to enter jobs in the public, private and non-profit sectors. Community Development(Certificate)Close×The Community Development inter-disciplinary certificate program offers skills in organization planning, leadership development, and program evaluation.Program Page Community Development The Community Development inter-disciplinary certificate program offers skills in organization planning, leadership development, and program evaluation. Community Psychology(Master's)Close×The MS in Community Psychology is designed for those interested in working within communities to affect changes that enhance the opportunities of all members, with a particular focus on the most vulnerable.Program Page Community Psychology The MS in Community Psychology is designed for those interested in working within communities to affect changes that enhance the opportunities of all members, with a particular focus on the most vulnerable. Computer and Information Sciences(Doctoral)Close×The PhD program in Computer and Information Sciences (CIS) offers an opportunity to pursue computing-related research that will advance state-of-the-art knowledge.Program Page Computer and Information Sciences The PhD program in Computer and Information Sciences (CIS) offers an opportunity to pursue computing-related research that will advance state-of-the-art knowledge. Computer Science(Bachelor's)Close×The BS in Computer Science provides essential training in the foundations of computing, data storage and information processing.Program Page Computer Science The BS in Computer Science provides essential training in the foundations of computing, data storage and information processing. Computer Science(Master's)Close×MS in Computer Science graduates are excellent programmers, capable of programming front-end web and mobile applications, as well as back-end services.Program Page Computer Science MS in Computer Science graduates are excellent programmers, capable of programming front-end web and mobile applications, as well as back-end services. Consumer Behavior(Seminar)Close×The Consumer Behavior seminar explores the value of understanding consumer trends and techniques in ways that bring value to your business.Program Page Consumer Behavior The Consumer Behavior seminar explores the value of understanding consumer trends and techniques in ways that bring value to your business. Content Marketing Strategy(Certificate)Close×Content Marketing Strategy certificate provides brand, product, and service information before interaction with an organization to transform brand awareness into purchases.Program Page Content Marketing Strategy Content Marketing Strategy certificate provides brand, product, and service information before interaction with an organization to transform brand awareness into purchases. Counseling(Master's)Close×The MA/MEd in Counseling produces skilled leaders in three specialty areas, all accredited by the Council for Accreditation of Counseling and Educational Programs (CACREP).Program Page Counseling The MA/MEd in Counseling produces skilled leaders in three specialty areas, all accredited by the Council for Accreditation of Counseling and Educational Programs (CACREP). Criminology(Bachelor's)Close×The BA in Criminology provides students the analytical, research and organizational skills needed to improve the criminal legal system for both victims and offenders.Program Page Criminology The BA in Criminology provides students the analytical, research and organizational skills needed to improve the criminal legal system for both victims and offenders. Critical Ethnic Studies(Certificate)Close×The Critical Ethnic Studies Graduate certificate program introduces students to critical race theory and social movements through an intersectional approach.Program Page Critical Ethnic Studies The Critical Ethnic Studies Graduate certificate program introduces students to critical race theory and social movements through an intersectional approach. CRT - Managing Change(Certificate)Close×The Managing Innovation and Change in the Workplace Certificate Program is designed to equip you for a changing marketplace now and in the future.Program Page CRT - Managing Change The Managing Innovation and Change in the Workplace Certificate Program is designed to equip you for a changing marketplace now and in the future. CRT-Crisis Communication(Certificate)Close×This four-week certificate program enables professional communicators to act quickly to assess a possible critical situation and disseminate key messages to the appropriate audiences.Program Page CRT-Crisis Communication This four-week certificate program enables professional communicators to act quickly to assess a possible critical situation and disseminate key messages to the appropriate audiences. Curriculum Studies(Doctoral)Close×The PhD in Curriculum Studies prepares students to work for educational excellence and focuses on curriculum in the context of sociocultural and political environments.Program Page Curriculum Studies The PhD in Curriculum Studies prepares students to work for educational excellence and focuses on curriculum in the context of sociocultural and political environments. Customer Relationship Management (CRM)(Certificate)Close×The Customer Relationship Management certificate analyzes key decision variables of customer satisfaction and brand loyalty in B2C, B2B and B2B2C environments.Program Page Customer Relationship Management (CRM) The Customer Relationship Management certificate analyzes key decision variables of customer satisfaction and brand loyalty in B2C, B2B and B2B2C environments. Cybersecurity(Bachelor's)Close×The BS in Cybersecurity prepares students to manage an organization's computer, information and network security, and develop a solid information technology infrastructure.Program Page Cybersecurity The BS in Cybersecurity prepares students to manage an organization's computer, information and network security, and develop a solid information technology infrastructure. Cybersecurity(Master's)Close×The MS in Cybersecurity prepares students to design, implement and maintain systems to support security policy and network architecture to mitigate risk and future attacks.Program Page Cybersecurity The MS in Cybersecurity prepares students to design, implement and maintain systems to support security policy and network architecture to mitigate risk and future attacks. Data Science(Master's)Close×The MS in Data Science provides students with the technical knowledge and computational skills for a successful career in big data analytics.Program Page Data Science The MS in Data Science provides students with the technical knowledge and computational skills for a successful career in big data analytics. Decision Analytics for Adult Students(Bachelor's)Close×The BA in Decision Analytics for Adults provides students a foundation of knowledge in the collection, analysis and communication of complex and dynamic data sets.Program Page Decision Analytics for Adult Students The BA in Decision Analytics for Adults provides students a foundation of knowledge in the collection, analysis and communication of complex and dynamic data sets. Developmental Therapist(Credential)Close×The Developmental Therapist credential coursework is for early childhood educators interested in working with very young children with disabilities and their families.Program Page Developmental Therapist The Developmental Therapist credential coursework is for early childhood educators interested in working with very young children with disabilities and their families. Digital Communication and Media Arts(Master's)Close×The MA in Digital Communication and Media Arts prepares students to use new technology to perform, persuade and communicate in a digital environment.Program Page Digital Communication and Media Arts The MA in Digital Communication and Media Arts prepares students to use new technology to perform, persuade and communicate in a digital environment. Digital Humanities(Certificate)Close×The graduate certificate in Digital Humanities program provides hands-on knowledge and guided experience with DH projects, tools, and methods.Program Page Digital Humanities The graduate certificate in Digital Humanities program provides hands-on knowledge and guided experience with DH projects, tools, and methods. Digital Marketing Fundamentals(Certificate)Close×Digital Marketing Fundamentals certificate teaches the terminology and strategy for internet search, web analytics, mobile marketing, social media, and digital advertising.Program Page Digital Marketing Fundamentals Digital Marketing Fundamentals certificate teaches the terminology and strategy for internet search, web analytics, mobile marketing, social media, and digital advertising. Digital Marketing Strategy(Certificate)Close×The Digital Marketing Strategy certificate program teaches search engine marketing, social media, content marketing, and data analytics to optimize marketing activities.Program Page Digital Marketing Strategy The Digital Marketing Strategy certificate program teaches search engine marketing, social media, content marketing, and data analytics to optimize marketing activities. Educational Leadership(Master's)Close×MA/MEd in Educational Leadership students learn to shape and inform policy, collaborate with stakeholders, build consensus, and be accountable for strategic outcomes.Program Page Educational Leadership MA/MEd in Educational Leadership students learn to shape and inform policy, collaborate with stakeholders, build consensus, and be accountable for strategic outcomes. Educational Leadership(Doctoral)Close×The EdD in Educational Leadership focuses on the human, organizational, political, social and technical systems of educational institutions.Program Page Educational Leadership The EdD in Educational Leadership focuses on the human, organizational, political, social and technical systems of educational institutions. Effective Presentation and Communication Skills(Certificate)Close×The Effective Presentation and Communication Skills certificate teaches students skills and techniques to become more effective presenter by improving delivery skills.Program Page Effective Presentation and Communication Skills The Effective Presentation and Communication Skills certificate teaches students skills and techniques to become more effective presenter by improving delivery skills. Elementary Education(Master's)Close×MA/MEd in Elementary Education graduates can pursue an initial Illinois Teaching License (PEL) with an Elementary Education (grades 1?6) endorsement.Program Page Elementary Education MA/MEd in Elementary Education graduates can pursue an initial Illinois Teaching License (PEL) with an Elementary Education (grades 1?6) endorsement. Emergency Management Administration(Certificate)Close×The Emergency Management Administration graduate certificate explores the conceptual elements of emergency preparedness and practical implementation of emergency management.Program Page Emergency Management Administration The Emergency Management Administration graduate certificate explores the conceptual elements of emergency preparedness and practical implementation of emergency management. Energy Policy and Management(Certificate)Close×Certificate program provides foundational knowledge about the global energy sector including energy policy, regulation, innovation and sustainability.Program Page Energy Policy and Management Certificate program provides foundational knowledge about the global energy sector including energy policy, regulation, innovation and sustainability. Exceptionality(Certificate)Close×The four-course certificate in Exceptionality provides a foundation in Special Education to those interested to expand their understanding of various types of disabilities.Program Page Exceptionality The four-course certificate in Exceptionality provides a foundation in Special Education to those interested to expand their understanding of various types of disabilities. Finance(Master's)Close×The MS in Finance prepares students to develop strategic financial objectives, improve investment decisions, manage corporate risk and seize new business opportunities.Program Page Finance The MS in Finance prepares students to develop strategic financial objectives, improve investment decisions, manage corporate risk and seize new business opportunities. Finance(Bachelor's)Close×The BA in Finance will provide students a solid foundation in financial management and an understanding of public and private financial processes and financial markets.Program Page Finance The BA in Finance will provide students a solid foundation in financial management and an understanding of public and private financial processes and financial markets. Finance and Accounting for Non-Financial Professionals(Course)Close×The Finance and Accounting for Non-financial Professionals course provides the basic tools and concepts of operational financial management and an overview of accounting methods.Program Page Finance and Accounting for Non-Financial Professionals The Finance and Accounting for Non-financial Professionals course provides the basic tools and concepts of operational financial management and an overview of accounting methods. Financial Planning(Certificate)Close×The Financial Planning certificate program covers financial planning, including insurance, investments, income tax, retirement and employee benefits, and estate planning.Program Page Financial Planning The Financial Planning certificate program covers financial planning, including insurance, investments, income tax, retirement and employee benefits, and estate planning. Foundations in Human Resources(Certificate)Close×The Foundations in Human Resources certificate provides Human Resources knowledge to prepare for the Associate Professional in Human Resources (aPHR) certification exam.Program Page Foundations in Human Resources The Foundations in Human Resources certificate provides Human Resources knowledge to prepare for the Associate Professional in Human Resources (aPHR) certification exam. Geographic Information Systems(Certificate)Close×The Geographic Information Systems undergraduate and graduate certificate provides sophisticated education in GIS, remote sensing and cartography.Program Page Geographic Information Systems The Geographic Information Systems undergraduate and graduate certificate provides sophisticated education in GIS, remote sensing and cartography. Global Health(Certificate)Close×The Global Health graduate certificate prepares professionals to work with communities to prioritize and investigate health concerns to achieve lasting social change.Program Page Global Health The Global Health graduate certificate prepares professionals to work with communities to prioritize and investigate health concerns to achieve lasting social change. Google Analytics Certificate Prep(Course)Close×The Google Analytics Certificate Prep course prepares students to earn Google Analytics Certification.Program Page Google Analytics Certificate Prep The Google Analytics Certificate Prep course prepares students to earn Google Analytics Certification. Governance, Risk Management, and Compliance(Certificate)Close×The Governance, Risk Management, and Compliance certificate focuses on enterprise-level information security risk management, IT audit and regulatory compliance.Program Page Governance, Risk Management, and Compliance The Governance, Risk Management, and Compliance certificate focuses on enterprise-level information security risk management, IT audit and regulatory compliance. Grant Writing(Certificate)Close×The Grant Writing certificate program is designed for those seeking a thorough grounding in the art and science involved in writing successful grant proposals.Program Page Grant Writing The Grant Writing certificate program is designed for those seeking a thorough grounding in the art and science involved in writing successful grant proposals. Health Care Administration(Certificate)Close×The Health Care Administration certificate provides the skills to understand and influence the processes through which organizations provide health care opportunities.Program Page Health Care Administration The Health Care Administration certificate provides the skills to understand and influence the processes through which organizations provide health care opportunities. Health Care Compliance(Certificate)Close×The Health Care Compliance certificate provides an understanding of complex health care regulations and policies, as well as quality of care, fraud, waste and abuse issues.Program Page Health Care Compliance The Health Care Compliance certificate provides an understanding of complex health care regulations and policies, as well as quality of care, fraud, waste and abuse issues. Health Informatics(Master's)Close×The MS in Health Informatics prepares students to implement and support IT solutions for health care services delivery and health information management.Program Page Health Informatics The MS in Health Informatics prepares students to implement and support IT solutions for health care services delivery and health information management. Health Sciences(Bachelor's)Close×The BS in Health Sciences prepares students for healthcare professions by combining biomedical instruction with an understanding of how societal factors impact health.Program Page Health Sciences The BS in Health Sciences prepares students for healthcare professions by combining biomedical instruction with an understanding of how societal factors impact health. Healthcare Administration for Adult Students(Bachelor's)Close×The BA in Healthcare for Adult Students is designed for working adults seeking to advance their careers in healthcare or redirect their careers to the healthcare area.Program Page Healthcare Administration for Adult Students The BA in Healthcare for Adult Students is designed for working adults seeking to advance their careers in healthcare or redirect their careers to the healthcare area. Human Computer-Interaction(Master's)Close×The MS in Human-Computer Interaction prepares students to ideate, design, implement and evaluate information and communication technologies (ICTs) for end users.Program Page Human Computer-Interaction The MS in Human-Computer Interaction prepares students to ideate, design, implement and evaluate information and communication technologies (ICTs) for end users. Human Resources(Master's)Close×The MS in Human Resources prepares graduates with the skills and knowledge to manage all core HR functions.Program Page Human Resources The MS in Human Resources prepares graduates with the skills and knowledge to manage all core HR functions. Human Resources Competencies(Certificate)Close×The Human Resources Competencies course teaches knowledge the Society for Human Resource Management (SHRM) believes prepares HR professionals for certification and success.Program Page Human Resources Competencies The Human Resources Competencies course teaches knowledge the Society for Human Resource Management (SHRM) believes prepares HR professionals for certification and success. IB Certificate MYP/DP(Course)Close×The IB four-part course provides a deep understanding of the International Baccalaureate (IB) curriculum and prepares participants for certification as IB educators.Program Page IB Certificate MYP/DP The IB four-part course provides a deep understanding of the International Baccalaureate (IB) curriculum and prepares participants for certification as IB educators. Information Systems(Master's)Close×The MS in Information Systems focuses on integrating business and technical emphasis on the development, management and planning of information systems.Program Page Information Systems The MS in Information Systems focuses on integrating business and technical emphasis on the development, management and planning of information systems. Information Technology(Bachelor's)Close×The BS in Information Technology provides skills related to the selection, creation, application, integration and administration of an organization's computing technologies.Program Page Information Technology The BS in Information Technology provides skills related to the selection, creation, application, integration and administration of an organization's computing technologies. Integrated Marketing Communications(Certificate)Close×The Integrated Marketing Communications (IMC) certificate provides a comprehensive understanding of the fundamentals to build a communication strategy for your organization.Program Page Integrated Marketing Communications The Integrated Marketing Communications (IMC) certificate provides a comprehensive understanding of the fundamentals to build a communication strategy for your organization. International Baccalaureate Educator(Certificate)Close×The IB certificate provides a deep understanding of the International Baccalaureate (IB) curriculum and prepares participants for certification as IB educators.Program Page International Baccalaureate Educator The IB certificate provides a deep understanding of the International Baccalaureate (IB) curriculum and prepares participants for certification as IB educators. International Studies(Certificate)Close×The International Studies certificate is designed to provide students with key competencies in critical thinking, research and data gathering in international contexts.Program Page International Studies The International Studies certificate is designed to provide students with key competencies in critical thinking, research and data gathering in international contexts. Jacobs and Stone Multichannel Marketing(Certificate)Close×The Jacobs and Stone Multichannel Marketing certificate program teaches the latest strategies, tools and techniques in direct, interactive, digital and database marketing.Program Page Jacobs and Stone Multichannel Marketing The Jacobs and Stone Multichannel Marketing certificate program teaches the latest strategies, tools and techniques in direct, interactive, digital and database marketing. Josei Toda's Educational Philosophy and Practice(Course)Close×Josei Toda's Educational Philosophy and Practice course introduces students to the biography, educational ideas, practices and addresses key terms in the Toda pedagogy.Program Page Josei Toda's Educational Philosophy and Practice Josei Toda's Educational Philosophy and Practice course introduces students to the biography, educational ideas, practices and addresses key terms in the Toda pedagogy. Journalism(Master's)Close×The MA in Journalism graduate receives not only an academic understanding of journalism but also gains a solid professional network and robust portfolio to show employers.Program Page Journalism The MA in Journalism graduate receives not only an academic understanding of journalism but also gains a solid professional network and robust portfolio to show employers. Labor Leadership(Certificate)Close×The six-course certificate program develops the skills to engage in enforcement of contractual and labor law, arbitration, organizing, bargaining practices and strategies.Program Page Labor Leadership The six-course certificate program develops the skills to engage in enforcement of contractual and labor law, arbitration, organizing, bargaining practices and strategies. Language Proficiency(Certificate)Close×The Language Proficiency certificate offers intermediate and advanced language proficiency to compete in today?s global workplace.Program Page Language Proficiency The Language Proficiency certificate offers intermediate and advanced language proficiency to compete in today?s global workplace. Law(Doctoral)Close×The Juris Doctor (JD) prepares students for legal practice with theoretical instruction for cutting edge legal problems and creative approaches to practical skills training.Program Page Law The Juris Doctor (JD) prepares students for legal practice with theoretical instruction for cutting edge legal problems and creative approaches to practical skills training. Leadership Studies for Adult Students(Bachelor's)Close×The BA in Leadership Studies for Adult Students focuses on effective leadership, communication, change management, the role of technology and globalization in governance.Program Page Leadership Studies for Adult Students The BA in Leadership Studies for Adult Students focuses on effective leadership, communication, change management, the role of technology and globalization in governance. LSAT Prep(Course)Close×The LSAT Prep course covers the four major components of the Law School Admission Test (LSAT), the required exam for people planning to apply to law school.Program Page LSAT Prep The LSAT Prep course covers the four major components of the Law School Admission Test (LSAT), the required exam for people planning to apply to law school. Management(Master's)Close×The MS in Management provides a thorough understanding of management theory and techniques to successfully lead, manage and implement change in a wide range of organizations.Program Page Management The MS in Management provides a thorough understanding of management theory and techniques to successfully lead, manage and implement change in a wide range of organizations. Management(Bachelor's)Close×The BS in Management program provides an overview of business operations, including techniques to strategically align the human, technology and financial assets of a firm.Program Page Management The BS in Management program provides an overview of business operations, including techniques to strategically align the human, technology and financial assets of a firm. Management Information Systems(Bachelor's)Close×The BS in Management Information Systems provides students both the business and technological foundations of information systems management.Program Page Management Information Systems The BS in Management Information Systems provides students both the business and technological foundations of information systems management. Marketing(Bachelor's)Close×The BS in Marketing deepens understanding of how marketing delivers value to customers and businesses including analyzing and solving market problems.Program Page Marketing The BS in Marketing deepens understanding of how marketing delivers value to customers and businesses including analyzing and solving market problems. Marketing(Master's)Close×The MS in Marketing program focuses on marketing strategy, consumer trends and data analysis, and business communications through the use of hands-on marketing scenarios.Program Page Marketing The MS in Marketing program focuses on marketing strategy, consumer trends and data analysis, and business communications through the use of hands-on marketing scenarios. Marketing Analytics Seminar(Seminar)Close×In this seminar, you will learn the terminology and strategy for marketing analytics across channels such as social media, paid search, digital display, email, and offline media.Program Page Marketing Analytics Seminar In this seminar, you will learn the terminology and strategy for marketing analytics across channels such as social media, paid search, digital display, email, and offline media. Marketing Return on Investment (ROI)(Seminar)Close×Marketing Return on Investment (ROI) seminar teaches ways to define and use ROI to solve business problems and ensure that marketing investments are measurable.Program Page Marketing Return on Investment (ROI) Marketing Return on Investment (ROI) seminar teaches ways to define and use ROI to solve business problems and ensure that marketing investments are measurable. Mathematics for Community College Teaching(Certificate)Close×The Certificate in Mathematics for Community College Teaching is to fortify the MAMEd degree for students who wish to teach at the community college level.Program Page Mathematics for Community College Teaching The Certificate in Mathematics for Community College Teaching is to fortify the MAMEd degree for students who wish to teach at the community college level. Metropolitan Planning and Development(Certificate)Close×The Metropolitan Planning and Development Graduate Certificate program provides students with a perspective on the institutions of municipal and metropolitan planning.Program Page Metropolitan Planning and Development The Metropolitan Planning and Development Graduate Certificate program provides students with a perspective on the institutions of municipal and metropolitan planning. MS-Business Analytics(Master's)Close×The MS in Business Analytics provides students the necessary techniques to turn complex data into solutions that drive business decisions for a wide range of industries.Program Page MS-Business Analytics The MS in Business Analytics provides students the necessary techniques to turn complex data into solutions that drive business decisions for a wide range of industries. Negotiation Strategies and Skills(Certificate)Close×The Negotiation Strategies and Skills certificate teaches the theory and practice of successful negotiations and conflict resolution to achieve desired outcome.Program Page Negotiation Strategies and Skills The Negotiation Strategies and Skills certificate teaches the theory and practice of successful negotiations and conflict resolution to achieve desired outcome. Network Engineering and Security(Master's)Close×The MS in Network Engineering and Security trains professionals to meet industry demands for innovative network designs.Program Page Network Engineering and Security The MS in Network Engineering and Security trains professionals to meet industry demands for innovative network designs. Network Engineering and Security(Bachelor's)Close×The BS in Network Engineering and Security focuses on the theory and practice of designing, deploying and managing both wired and wireless networks technologies.Program Page Network Engineering and Security The BS in Network Engineering and Security focuses on the theory and practice of designing, deploying and managing both wired and wireless networks technologies. Nonprofit Management(Master's)Close×The Master of Nonprofit Management (MNM) prepares students for leadership position in the nonprofit world or even ready them to start their own nonprofit organization.Program Page Nonprofit Management The Master of Nonprofit Management (MNM) prepares students for leadership position in the nonprofit world or even ready them to start their own nonprofit organization. Nonprofit Management for Adult Students(Bachelor's)Close×The BA in Nonprofit Management for Adult Students builds knowledge and skills for application in nonprofit settings, especially within supervisory and managerial positions.Program Page Nonprofit Management for Adult Students The BA in Nonprofit Management for Adult Students builds knowledge and skills for application in nonprofit settings, especially within supervisory and managerial positions. Nursing Practice(Doctoral)Close×The Doctor of Nursing Practice (DNP) program gives students the leadership, business and research skills to work with health care providers, administrators and researchers.Program Page Nursing Practice The Doctor of Nursing Practice (DNP) program gives students the leadership, business and research skills to work with health care providers, administrators and researchers. Paralegal Studies(Certificate)Close×The Paralegal Studies certificate program is a rigorous program focusing on the practical skills and legal fundamentals needed to succeed as a paralegal.Program Page Paralegal Studies The Paralegal Studies certificate program is a rigorous program focusing on the practical skills and legal fundamentals needed to succeed as a paralegal. Practical Internet Marketing(Certificate)Close×The Practical Internet Marketing certificate is a hands-on program that covers the best practices of internet marketing for small businesses and nonprofits.Program Page Practical Internet Marketing The Practical Internet Marketing certificate is a hands-on program that covers the best practices of internet marketing for small businesses and nonprofits. Predictive Analytics(Certificate)Close×The Predictive Analytics certificate program provides working knowledge of application and interpretation of advanced techniques used in the field of predictive analytics.Program Page Predictive Analytics The Predictive Analytics certificate program provides working knowledge of application and interpretation of advanced techniques used in the field of predictive analytics. Professional Business Writing(Certificate)Close×The Professional Business Writing certificate is designed to improve business writing skills and teach how to write more effectively.Program Page Professional Business Writing The Professional Business Writing certificate is designed to improve business writing skills and teach how to write more effectively. Professional in Human Resources(Certificate)Close×The Professional in Human Resources certificate prepares for the Professional in Human Resources (PHR) and Senior Professional in Human Resources (SPHR) certification exam.Program Page Professional in Human Resources The Professional in Human Resources certificate prepares for the Professional in Human Resources (PHR) and Senior Professional in Human Resources (SPHR) certification exam. Project Management(Certificate)Close×The Project Management certificate explores the complete project management life cycle, from project initiation, planning, executing, monitoring, controlling and closing.Program Page Project Management The Project Management certificate explores the complete project management life cycle, from project initiation, planning, executing, monitoring, controlling and closing. Project Management Graduate(Certificate)Close×The Project Management graduate certificate uses a cross-disciplinary approach to explore the appropriate development methodology to assure a successful IT implementation.Program Page Project Management Graduate The Project Management graduate certificate uses a cross-disciplinary approach to explore the appropriate development methodology to assure a successful IT implementation. Psychology (BA)(Bachelor's)Close×The BA in Psychology is for students to learn psychological theories and research methodologies, as well as gain an understanding of both scientific and applied psychology.Program Page Psychology (BA) The BA in Psychology is for students to learn psychological theories and research methodologies, as well as gain an understanding of both scientific and applied psychology. Psychology (BS)(Bachelor's)Close×The BS in Psychology program is for students that desire to gain a deeper scientific understanding of psychology, studying neuroscience, or pursue a pre-health career path.Program Page Psychology (BS) The BS in Psychology program is for students that desire to gain a deeper scientific understanding of psychology, studying neuroscience, or pursue a pre-health career path. Public Administration(Master's)Close×The Master of Public Administration (MPA) provides management skills for public sector leadership including organizational leadership, finance and public policy design.Program Page Public Administration The Master of Public Administration (MPA) provides management skills for public sector leadership including organizational leadership, finance and public policy design. Public Policy(Master's)Close×The Master of Public Policy gives students the skills, experience and analytical tools to shape governmental policies that influence our local, regional and national agendas.Program Page Public Policy The Master of Public Policy gives students the skills, experience and analytical tools to shape governmental policies that influence our local, regional and national agendas. Public Relations and Advertising(Bachelor's)Close×The BA in Public Relations and Advertising provides students a solid understanding of public relations and advertising theories and practices.Program Page Public Relations and Advertising The BA in Public Relations and Advertising provides students a solid understanding of public relations and advertising theories and practices. Public Relations and Advertising(Master's)Close×The MA in Public Relations and Advertising prepares students for public relations, advertising and communications fields with a focus on digital, social and traditional media.Program Page Public Relations and Advertising The MA in Public Relations and Advertising prepares students for public relations, advertising and communications fields with a focus on digital, social and traditional media.
